text: Join @HeroesResearch for a town hall Thurs. 3/4. @califf001 will join DCRI's @texhern and @emilycob to discuss how HERO-TOGETHER is helping to understand #COVID19 #vaccine safety and share early findings. Open to anyone affiliated w a health care setting! https://t.co/0sJMP1lnzI https://t.co/Hy50FXKyPp
